Scripts.OnLoad: local AL = LibStub("AceLocale-3.0"):GetLocale("AtlasLoot"); getglobal(this:GetName().."Text"):SetText(AL["Show itemIDs at all times"]);
local AL = LibStub("AceLocale-3.0"):GetLocale("AtlasLoot"); getglobal(this:GetName().."Text"):SetText(AL["Load Loot Modules at Startup"]);

Scripts.OnClick: if AtlasLoot.db.profile.HidePanel then AtlasLoot.db.profile.HidePanel = false; if (AtlasFrame) then if AtlasFrame:IsVisible() then AtlasLootPanel:Show(); end end else AtlasLoot.db.profile.HidePanel = true; if (AtlasFrame) then if AtlasFrame:IsVisible() then AtlasLootPanel:Hide(); end end end

Scripts.OnLoad: local AL = LibStub("AceLocale-3.0"):GetLocale("AtlasLoot"); getglobal("AtlasLootOptionsFrame_FuBarNotice"):SetText(AL["The Minimap Button is generated by the FuBar Plugin."].."\n"..AL["This is automatic, you do not need FuBar installed."]);
